channel.title: Learning reverse enginning using ollydbg
channel.description:
This is a video tutorial on most asked questions when using assembly language to reserve engineer programs like whats a OEP. how to set a hardware breakpoint. whats a exe packer? how do you know if your program is packed. How to get to OEP without wasting hours stepping threw the code.
To make bots and all kinds of things I already know basic cracking but when I tried this on java.exe for runescape to try to mess with model colors I hit a expection obvious some anti-debugger stuff going on that I don't know about.
[b]Anyways to the point this also teaches people to stop treating black people like crap not saying i'm black but this person is probably smarter then most of the people here who try to use big words and piss someone off honestly they are just wasting their time..[/b]
Question and Answers video (most useful for beginners) http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uq3HY-bx3Gg
This is where he attempted to make a series of reversing videoes.. probably gave up since its 2 years old. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_MWYbVG7e18 Gotta admit he didn't do it effienctly as he used another tool HIEW a hexadecimal binary editor to modify changes to his EXE.. Since he could just use HIEW why not just dump the crackme with changes straight from ollydbg since it's obviously wasn't packed.
Anyways guys knowledge can be picked up anywhere from decent research.

item.title: Learning reverse enginning using ollydbg

item.description:
@Punniabi16 wrote:

This is a video tutorial on most asked questions when using assembly language to reserve engineer programs
like whats a OEP.
how to set a hardware breakpoint.
whats a exe packer? how do you know if your program is packed.
How to get to OEP without wasting hours stepping threw the code.

To make bots and all kinds of things I already know basic cracking but when I tried this on java.exe for runescape to try to mess with model colors I hit a expection obvious some anti-debugger stuff going on that I don’t know about.

Anyways to the point this also teaches people to stop treating black people like crap not saying i’m black but this person is probably smarter then most of the people here who try to use big words and piss someone off honestly they are just wasting their time…

Question and Answers video (most useful for beginners)

This is where he attempted to make a series of reversing videoes… probably gave up since its 2 years old.


Gotta admit he didn’t do it effienctly as he used another tool HIEW a hexadecimal binary editor to modify changes to his EXE…
Since he could just use HIEW why not just dump the crackme with changes straight from ollydbg since it’s obviously wasn’t packed.

Anyways guys knowledge can be picked up anywhere from decent research.
